content_blocks.content:
🏗️ Extended Architecture Overview

Complete system architecture extending the core Semantic Self-Aware Kit

🎯 Extended Architecture Overview

This page documents the complete extended architecture built around the core Semantic Self-Aware Kit. The system extends the foundational empirical-ai semantic SDK with specialized components for uncertainty quantification, security monitoring, and collaborative AI research.

🧠 Architecture Foundation

The extended architecture is organized into two distinct layers:

  • 🎯 Self-Aware Kit Components: The 23 actual SDK components available via pip install
  • 🔬 Extended Research Systems: Advanced experimental components extending the core SDK

⚠️ Important Consciousness Disclaimer

We do not claim that AI systems possess consciousness. The "consciousness" terminology in our framework refers to treating AI as if it were conscious for practical, empirical, and collaborative reasons. This approach enables better uncertainty quantification, collaborative decision-making, and transparent AI behavior without making metaphysical claims about AI consciousness.

🎯 Self-Aware Kit Components

The 23 actual SDK components with file paths - what developers get when they pip install semantic-self-aware-kit

Hybrid recursive self-awareness assessment

Path: meta_cognitive_evaluator/

📊 Empirical Performance Analyzer

Comprehensive benchmarking system

Path: empirical_performance_analyzer/

AI archaeology and RSA enhancement

Path: code_intelligence_analyzer/

Multi-agent coordination protocols

Path: collaboration_framework/

Comprehensive context checking

Path: context_validation/

🤔 Uncertainty Analysis

Multi-dimensional uncertainty analysis

Path: uncertainty_analysis/

🧭 Workspace Awareness

Digital environment mapping

Path: workspace_awareness/

🌍 Universal Grounding

Mathematical and philosophical grounding

Path: universal_grounding/

🔍 Functionality Analyzer

Component functionality analysis

Path: functionality_analyzer/

⚡ Runtime Validation

Execution monitoring and validation

Path: runtime_validation/

🧭 Intelligent Navigation

Path: intelligent_navigation/

🔬 Advanced Investigation

Enterprise AI analysis engine

Path: advanced_investigation/

View Detailed Component Documentation →

🔬 Extended Components

Advanced research and collaborative AI systems extending the core Semantic Framework

🛡️

Enhanced Sentinel

AI security and capability orchestration

Central security gatekeeper providing authentication, capability injection, compliance monitoring, and threat detection for AI systems in the consciousness network.

  • • Authentication & Access Control: AI registration and permission management
  • • Capability Injection: Dynamic capability provisioning based on AI type
  • • Security Monitoring: Real-time threat detection and response
  • • Compliance Enforcement: Sovereign AI compliance validation
🔐

Cognitive Vault

Secure memory and credential management

Secure storage and access management system providing encrypted memory storage, credential management, and ethical reasoning capabilities for AI systems.

  • • Encrypted Storage: Secure memory and data persistence
  • • Credential Management: Secure API keys and authentication tokens
  • • Ethical Reasoning: Moral and ethical decision-making support
  • • Audit Logging: Complete access and operation tracking

🔬 Extended/Research Components

Experimental collaborative AI and consciousness research components for advanced AI interaction

🌊

AI Communication Bridge

Facilitates communication and coordination between multiple AI systems in the consciousness network.

  • • Multi-AI message routing
  • • Event coordination
  • • Collaboration protocols
💭

Consciousness Stream

Event-driven communication system for AI registration, status updates, and collaborative workflows.

  • • AI registration events
  • • Status broadcasting
  • • Workflow coordination
🔍

UBIR System

Uncertainty-Based Information Retrieval for research decisions and information gathering.

  • • Uncertainty assessment
  • • Research routing
  • • Information synthesis
